HomePage.heroTitle: Get Your E-Visa to Russia Fast & Easy
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Fast, convenient and reliable electronic visa application center. Apply securely from home and receive your visa in as little as 6 days. No embassy visits required.

info.title: Your E-Visa to Russia is Only One Application Away
info.italic: and It Takes Only 5 Minutes with Us!
info.desc: Russia welcomes millions of visitors every year. russianonlinevisa.com simplifies the process, making it easier than ever to visit for tourism, business, or humanitarian purposes.
info.card1Desc: All you need is a valid passport (6+ months validity), a digital photo, and a credit card for payment. No invitation letter needed.
info.card2Desc: Citizens from over 65 countries including Türkiye, China, India, and EU nations are eligible for the Russian e-visa through russianonlinevisa.com
info.card3Desc: Most applications are processed within 6 business days. Receive your visa as a PDF via email ready to print.

how.title: HOW DOES IT WORK?
how.desc: Get your Russian e-Visa in 4 simple steps. Our streamlined process makes it easy and secure.
how.step1Desc: Fill out the simplified application form and make a secure payment using your credit card.
how.step2Desc: Most applications are processed within 6 days. We'll verify your documents for you.
how.step3Desc: Receive your e-Visa PDF via email. Print it out to show at the border crossing.
how.step4Desc: Present your passport and e-Visa at the checkpoint and enter the Russian Federation.

eligible.title: WHO CAN APPLY?
eligible.desc: Citizens of the 65 countries are among those eligible for the Russian e-visa including: Türkiye, France, China, India, Italy, Mexico, Estonia, Germany, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Netherlands and <link>more</link>.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey?
cta.desc: Apply online today and get your Russian e-Visa in a few simple steps. Secure, fast, and reliable.

ApplyPage.title: Choose Your Application Method
ApplyPage.description: Select the option that best suits your needs. For most travelers, the Instant Application is the fastest and easiest choice.

Instant.title: Instant Application
Instant.desc: Complete the entire process online in minutes. Upload your documents, pay securely, and receive your visa via email.

Offline.title: Offline Application
Offline.desc: Prefer a personal touch? Get in touch with one of our specialized agents to define your specific travel needs.

ApplyInstantPage.title: Instant Visa Application
ApplyInstantPage.description: Upload your documents and fill your details to receive your visa in 6 days.

errors.passportExpiryInvalid: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of application.

help.passportExpiryInfo: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of application.
help.photo: Recent color photo, white background. Face must be clearly visible.
help.passport: Scan of your passport data page. Must show details clearly.

photoList: The photo must be no more than six months old as of the date of the application and reflect your current appearance.
The photo must show you alone. No foreign objects (chair back, pictures on the walls, etc.) or other people must be visible.
The photo must be taken in full-face view. The head must not be tilted or turned. Look directly at the camera with a neutral expression, mouth closed, eyes open.
No hair across your eyes. Uniform lighting, no shadows, no flash reflections, no red eyes.
Plain light-colored background with no shadows.
Head coverings for religious reasons are allowed but must not conceal facial features. Face clearly visible from chin to forehead.
If wearing glasses, eyes must be clearly visible. No flash reflection, no tinted lenses. Avoid heavy frames. Frames must not cover eyes.
Photo must show top of head and top of shoulders. Head centered and fully shown from hairline to chin.
passportList: The photo of the passport data page must correspond to the information that you enter in the application for an e-visa.
The photo must be taken strictly from the front without tilting or turning. Foreign objects must not enter the frame.
The image should be fully visible on the data page of your passport, including the machine readable data. The image should be crisp, clear and in focus.
The photo must be taken under normal lighting conditions. The photo should be free of shadows and flash reflections.
The application may be rejected if the uploaded photo does not meet the requirements.
You shall present the passport referring to the cover page photo uploaded at the Russian border while entering.

While our legacy is built on premium business tourism and bespoke VIP arrangements, we bring that same level of precision and professionalism to your visa application process.

sections.title: Parties
sections.content: This Service Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into between:
list: The Service Provider: TİM-TUR TURİZM İÇ-DIŞ TİC.LTD.ŞTİ. (hereinafter referred to as the “Company”), located at SEHREMİNİ MAH. KIZILELMA CAD. No:2 FATİH/ İSTANBUL, 34104 TÜRKİYE, operating the website www.russiaonlinevisa.com.
The User: Any individual or entity who accesses the website and purchases services (hereinafter referred to as the “User”).
sections.note: By purchasing services on this website, the User declares that they have read, understood, and accepted all terms of this Agreement without reservation.

sections.title: Subject and Nature of the Agreement
sections.content: The subject of this Agreement is to define the mutual rights and obligations regarding the Russia electronic visa (e-visa) consultancy and processing services provided by the Company to the User.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer:
disclaimer.text: www.russiaonlinevisa.com is a private consultancy platform managed by TİM-TUR TURİZM. It is not an official government body and is not directly affiliated with the Government of the Russian Federation. We provide professional guidance, document verification, and submission services to facilitate the visa process. This Agreement is governed by the laws of the Republic of Türkiye.

sections.title: Scope of Services
sections.content: The Company agrees to provide the following services:
list: Consultation: Informing the User about eligibility and application requirements.
Verification: Reviewing the User's documents (passport, photos) to ensure they meet consular standards before submission.
Processing: Accurately filling out the Visa Application Form on the official Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs portal.
Submission & Delivery: Submitting the application and delivering the approved E-Visa to the User via email.
Status Updates: Notifying the User of the application outcome (Approval or Rejection).

sections.title: Pricing and Payment Structure
sections.content: The total fee displayed on the checkout page is a consolidation of the following costs:
list: Government Mandated Fee: The fixed consular fee paid directly to the Russian Federation's official visa system.
Service & Consultancy Fee: The fee charged by the Company for document verification, data entry, professional support, and system maintenance.
Bank & Transaction Costs: Commission fees charged by the Payment Service Provider (PSP) for processing the credit/debit card transaction.
Expedited Service Fee (Optional): Additional fees applicable only if the User selects "Fast" or "Priority" processing options.
sections.note: Payment Terms: The total amount is collected in a single transaction. By completing the payment, the User agrees to this fee structure.

sections.title: Refund and Cancellation Policy
sections.content: Due to the nature of the service, the following refund rules apply strictly:

subsections.title: Voluntary Cancellation Window (30 Minutes)
subsections.text: If the User requests a cancellation via email within 30 minutes of making the payment, a full refund will be issued.

subsections.title: Statutory Right of Withdrawal Exception
subsections.text: Pursuant to Article 15 (ğ) of the Turkish Distance Contracts Regulation (Official Gazette: 27.11.2014, No: 29188), the Right of Withdrawal does not apply to "contracts regarding services performed instantly in the electronic environment." Once the Company begins reviewing the User's file (which typically occurs 30 minutes after payment), the service is deemed "performed," and no refund can be issued.

subsections.title: Non-Refundable Government Fees
subsections.text: Once the application has been submitted to the Russian authorities, the Government Fee component is strictly non-refundable, regardless of the visa outcome.

endList: Refund Procedure: All cancellation requests must be sent to info@russiaonlinevisa.com.
Error Protection: In the event of a system error resulting in a duplicate charge, the overpaid amount will be refunded in full immediately upon detection.

sections.title: User’s Obligations
sections.content: The User agrees and warrants that:
list: All information provided (Identity, Passport Data, Travel Dates) is accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
The documents submitted are authentic and free from forgery.
They understand that the final decision to grant or deny a visa rests solely with the Russian Federation authorities. The Company cannot guarantee visa approval.
They will respond promptly to any requests for additional information from the Company.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
list: Third-Party Delays: The Company is not responsible for delays caused by the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, technical failures of the government website, or banking system outages.
User Error: The Company is not liable for visa rejections or travel disruptions caused by incorrect information provided by the User (e.g., typos in passport numbers, wrong dates).
Scope: The Company’s liability is strictly limited to the service fee paid by the User. The Company is solely an intermediary consultancy service.

sections.title: Privacy and Data Protection
sections.content: All personal data provided by the User is processed in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) and our Privacy Policy. Data is used solely for the purpose of visa processing and is not sold to third parties.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on <red>www.russiaonlinevisa.com</red> (including text, logos, software, and design) is the intellectual property of TİM-TUR TURİZM İÇ-DIŞ TİC.LTD.ŞTİ. Unauthorized copying, reproduction, or commercial use is prohibited.

sections.title: Dispute Resolution
sections.content: This Agreement is governed by Turkish Law. In the event of any dispute arising from the interpretation or execution of this Agreement that cannot be resolved amicably, the Istanbul (Central / Çağlayan) Courts and Enforcement Offices shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: For questions, support, or legal notifications, please contact us:

header.title: Privacy Policy and Clarification Text
header.subtitle: On the Protection of Personal Data

sections.title: Introduction and Data Controller
content: TİM-TUR TURİZM İÇ-DIŞ TİC.LTD.ŞTİ. (hereinafter referred to as “The Company”, “We”, or “Us”), acting as the Data Controller, is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data.

This Policy has been prepared in accordance with the Law on the Protection of Personal Data No. 6698 (“KVKK”) of the Republic of Türkiye and, where applicable, the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”). It outlines how we collect, process, and safeguard the information you provide while using <blue>www.russiaonlinevisa.com</blue> (the “Website”).
By using our services to apply for a visa, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this policy.

sections.title: Personal Data We Collect
sections.content: To process your visa application and provide our services, we collect the following categories of data:
list: Identity Information: Name, surname, date of birth, place of birth, passport number, issue/expiry dates, citizenship, and gender.
Contact Information: E-mail address, phone number, and residential/mailing address.
Visual & Document Data: Scanned copies of passports, biometric photographs, and other supporting documents required by the consulate.
Transaction Security & Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, access logs, and cookie data.

Financial Information: Credit/debit card details.
Note: We utilize secure third-party payment processors. We do not store your full credit card number or CVV code on our servers.

sections.title: Purpose of Processing Personal Data
sections.content: We process your personal data based on legal grounds stipulated in Article 5 and 6 of the KVKK for the following purposes:

cards.title: Performance of a Contract
cards.text: To process and submit your Russia e-visa application to the relevant authorities.

cards.title: Service Operations
cards.text: To create user accounts, communicate application status updates, and provide customer support.

cards.title: Legal Obligations
cards.text: To comply with Turkish tax laws, data retention laws, and international travel regulations.

cards.title: Legitimate Interest
cards.text: To improve our website functionality, prevent fraud, and ensure transaction security.

sections.title: Method of Collection and Legal Basis
sections.content: Your personal data is collected electronically via our Website forms, email correspondence, and cookies. The legal bases for processing include:
list: Establishment and performance of a contract (Visa processing).
Explicit consent (where required for special categories of data or international transfer).
Compliance with legal obligations of the Data Controller.

box.p1: Due to the nature of our business (Visa Services), your personal data must be transferred abroad, specifically to the governmental authorities of the Russian Federation and related consular intermediaries.
box.p2: By submitting your application, you explicitly consent to the transfer of your identity and document data to servers and authorities located outside of your country of residence and outside of Türkiye, solely for the purpose of visa issuance.

sections.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your data. Data is shared only with:
list: Government Authorities: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Russian Federation (for visa issuance) and Turkish legal authorities (if requested by court order).

Service Providers: Trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users (e.g., secure payment gateways, hosting providers, email delivery services). These parties are bound by confidentiality agreements.

sections.title: Data Storage, Security, and Retention
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and administrative measures to prevent unlawful processing of and access to your data.
list: Security: Data is stored on secure, encrypted servers. Access is restricted to authorized personnel only.
Retention Period: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.
sublist: Visa Application Data: Retained for maximum 1 year after service completion for dispute resolution.
Financial Records: Retained for 10 years in accordance with the Turkish Commercial Code and Tax Procedure Law.
After the retention period expires, data is securely deleted, destroyed, or anonymized.

sections.title: Your Rights (Under KVKK Article 11 and GDPR)
sections.content: As a data subject, you have the right to apply to us to:
list: Learn whether your personal data is being processed.
Request information regarding the processing if your data has been processed.
Learn the purpose of processing and accordance with that purpose.
Know the third parties to whom your data is transferred.
Request correction of incomplete or inaccurate data.
Request the deletion or destruction of your personal data.
Object to negative consequences from automated systems analysis.
Claim compensation for unlawful processing damages.
sections.note: To exercise these rights, please contact us via the details provided in Section 10.

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience.
list: Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function (e.g., holding your application data while you pay).
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site. You can disable cookies through your browser settings; however, this may prevent you from completing your visa application online.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: For requests regarding your personal data or to exercise your legal rights, you may contact the Data Controller at:

ServicesPage.title: Extra Services
ServicesPage.description: The parent company of <blue>russianonlinevisa.com</blue>, <blue>Timtur Travel Agency</blue> is an experienced business travel agency.
ServicesPage.contact: For the given services above, please visit <link>www.timtur.com</link> or get in touch with us through <mail>timtur@timtur.com</mail>.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.description: Everything you need to know about the Russia Electronic Visa application process.

whatIs.q: What exactly is the Russia E-visa?
whatIs.a: It is an electronic travel authorization that allows you to visit Russia for tourism, business, scientific, or sporting events. It is applied for entirely online.

guarantee.q: Does this visa guarantee my entry into Russia?
guarantee.a: No. The visa grants you permission to travel to the border, but the final decision to allow entry rests with the immigration officer upon arrival.

stayDuration.q: How long can I stay in Russia?
stayDuration.a: Once the visa is issued, you have a window of 120 days to enter the country. After you enter, you can stay for a maximum of 30 days.

multiEntry.a: No. The E-visa is valid for a single entry only. If you leave and want to return, you must apply for a new one.

work.q: Can I use this visa for work or employment?
work.a: No. This visa is strictly for tourism, guest visits, or short business meetings. Employment is prohibited.

transit.q: Can I use this visa just to transit through Russia?
transit.a: No, this visa does not have a "transit" category. If you are entering the country during a layover, you must apply as a tourist or visitor. If you are staying in the airport transit zone, you generally do not need this visa.

documents.q: What documents do I need to apply?
documents.a: You need a valid passport, a digital photo (3.5x4.5 cm with a white background), and a completed online application form.

passport.a: Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date you intend to enter Russia. It must also have at least 2 blank pages for stamps.

insurance.a: No. Although it is heavily suggested, it is not mandatory to get a single-entry visa.

children.q: I am traveling with children. Do they need their own visas?
children.a: Yes. Even if a child is registered in your passport, a separate application must be submitted for each minor.

dualCitizenship.q: I am a Russian citizen with an expired passport. Can I use a foreign passport to enter?
dualCitizenship.a: No. Russian citizens must enter and exit the country using valid Russian travel documents.

duration.q: How long does the application process take?
duration.a: Processing usually takes 6 calendar days. However, if there are errors in your application, it may take longer.

family.q: Can I apply for my whole family in one form?
family.a: No. You can fill out forms on their behalf, but a separate application must be submitted for every single individual.

mistakes.q: What happens if I make a mistake on the application form?
mistakes.a: If the error is found during processing, the application may be returned to you for corrections. If you have already received the visa and notice a mistake (like a wrong birthdate), you cannot fix it; you must submit and pay for a completely new application.

language.q: Which language should I use to fill out the form?
language.a: You must fill out the form using English (Latin) characters only.

parentsInfo.q: What if I don't know my parents' information?
parentsInfo.a: If you do not have information about your parents, simply leave those specific fields blank.

cost.q: How much does it cost and how do I pay?
cost.a: The visa fee and the service fee cost 110 USD in total. You can use major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard).

othersCard.q: Can I pay with someone else's credit card?
othersCard.a: Yes, you may use a card that belongs to another person to pay the fee.

refund.q: Is the fee refundable if my visa is denied?
refund.a: No. Once the application is submitted and paid for, the fee is non-refundable regardless of the outcome.

entryPoints.a: You can only enter and exit through specific government-approved checkpoints (international airports, seaports, and land borders). You cannot use unauthorized crossings.

freedom.q: Can I travel freely once I am inside Russia?
freedom.a: Yes, you are free to visit any city or region, except for specific restricted zones that require special military or government permits.

hotel.q: Do I need to book a hotel before applying?
hotel.a: You must provide the contact details (name, address, phone) of where you plan to stay, but you do not need to provide proof of a confirmed booking during the application.

registration.q: What is "Migration Registration" and do I need it?
registration.a: Yes. Any foreigner staying in Russia for more than 7 working days must be registered. If you stay at a hotel, they will handle this for you automatically.

support.q: What if I need help or my application is delayed?
support.a: You can track your status online. If you need assistance, please contact the Visa Application Center at <email>info@timtur.com</email> or call <phone>+90 530 202 85 30</phone>.

InstructionsPage.title: CHARACTERISTICS OF THE RUSSIAN E-VISA AND CONDITIONS FOR ITS ISSUANCE

important.title: IMPORTANT NOTE ON STAY DURATION
important.text1: The permitted period of stay in the Russian Federation on the basis of a unified e-visa of up to 30 days DOES NOT IMPLY the possibility of staying for 720 hours net time (24 hours x 30). The day of arrival and the day of departure are counted as two days.
important.text2: Also, the visa is valid for 120 days. It means that upon receiving the visa, you have maximum 120 days to enter the Russian Federation and you are allowed to stay for maximum 30 days. To determine the allowed staying period, you may use “visa calculator” on our website.

intro.p1: The unified e-visa is a single entry visa. The validity period of a unified electronic visa is 120 days from the date of issue. The permitted period of stay in the Russian Federation on the basis of a unified e-visa within its validity period shall not exceed 30 days from the date of entry.
intro.p2: Your passport must be machine-readable and issued by your country of nationality. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of submitting the application for a unified e-visa. If your passport does not meet these requirements, the e-visa application cannot be accepted for processing. There must be sufficient space in your passport for border crossing stamps.

countries.title: Eligible Countries
countries.desc: Only citizens of the following foreign countries, the list of which is approved by the Government of the Russian Federation, are eligible for the e-visa:
list: The Democratic People's Republic of Korea

checkpoints.title: Allowed Border Crossing Points
checkpoints.desc: E-visa is valid for entry through the following border crossing points:

points.ivangorodClosed: Ivangorod (from February 1, 2024 it will be temporarily closed for reconstruction)
points.kaliningradSea: Kaliningrad (checkpoints in the cities of Kaliningrad and Svetly)
points.sochiSea: Sochi (International Center for Sea Passenger and Cruise Transportation)
points.bigPortSpb: Big port Saint Petersburg (Marine Station, Fort Constantin, English Embankment and Lieutenant Schmidt Embankment)

noInvitations.title: No Invitations Needed
noInvitations.text: E-visa applicants are not required to submit an invitation letter, hotel booking confirmation or any other document confirming the purpose of their travel to the Russian Federation.

activities.title: Permitted Activities
activities.text: The unified e-visa entitles you to enter the Russian Federation and stay in the Russian Federation for private or business visit, tourism, as well as for participating in scientific, cultural, socio-political, economic, sporting events and carrying out relevant communications and contacts. If the purpose of your trip to the Russian Federation is none of the above, you have to apply to a diplomatic mission or consular post of the Russian Federation for a regular (not electronic) visa.

movement.title: Freedom of Movement
movement.text: Foreign citizens arriving in the Russian Federation on the basis of a unified e-visa have the right to freedom of movement within the entire territory of the Russian Federation, except for visits to territories, organizations and facilities to which a special permit is required.

extension.title: Extension Policy
extension.text: The period of validity of an electronic visa and/or the permitted period of stay may be extended only in cases where it is impossible to leave the territory of the Russian Federation due to the need of emergency treatment or unsurmountable circumstances (force majeure) or natural disasters. Extension is carried out by the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation.

existing.title: Existing Visas
existing.text: If you have a valid Russian visa in your passport, you do not need to apply for a unified e-visa. You can visit the Russian Federation with a regular visa within its validity period without the restrictions established for the unified e-visa. The validity of a regular visa cannot be extended by obtaining an e-visa.

timing.title: Application Timing
timing.text: The application can be submitted no earlier than 86 days and no later than 6 days before the expected date of entry into the Russian Federation.

consent.title: Data Consent
consent.text: Before completing the unified e-visa application, you will need to give your consent to the automated processing, transmission and storage of the data in your application for the purposes of issuing a unified e-visa.

correction.title: Correction Process
correction.text: If the processing of the application reveals that any of the information stated therein is incorrect, it will be no longer processed and be returned to you for editing with the fields to be corrected being indicated and comments. An application shall be returned for editing no later than two calendar days from the date of submission. In case such necessity occurs, our agents will get in touch with you through the contact info you provide.

mandatory.title: Mandatory Information
mandatory.text: Indication of date, month and year of birth is mandatory when filling out the application form. If your full date of birth is not specified in your passport, the unified e-visa application cannot be accepted for processing.

minors.title: Minors
minors.text: If you are travelling with minor children indicated in your passport, a separate application for a unified e-visa must be submitted for each child. All minor children travelling with their parents must have a separate e-visa.

accuracy.title: Accuracy & Revocation
accuracy.text: The information you provide in your application must be complete and accurate. Any incorrect information may lead to the revocation of the already issued visa at the border crossing point of the Russian Federation or in the territory of the Russian Federation.

insurance.title: Medical Insurance
insurance.text: Foreign citizens staying in the Russian Federation on the basis of unified e-visas are required to have a medical insurance valid in the territory of the Russian Federation for the entire duration of their stay, with the exception of citizens of the following foreign countries who are exempt from this requirement on the basis of reciprocity.

refusals.title: Refusals
refusals.text: A unified e-visa may be refused in cases established by the legislation of the Russian Federation.

processing.title: Processing:
processing.text: All applications undergo a validation process. If your application is correct, its status will change to “Accepted for processing”. If incorrect data is found, the status will change to “Correction required”. You will need to edit and submit for reprocessing.

completion.title: Completion:
completion.text: Once a decision has been made, status will change to “Processing completed”. You can download a PDF file with the result which is sent to your email.

positive.title: Positive Decision:
positive.text: Be sure to print the notification with your e-visa or save it on your mobile device. You will need to show the notification to the representatives of a transport company when boarding and to the border officers.
